snippet: Senate leaders, however, are blocking an abortion rights provision from coming to a vote.
abstract: Editorial praises New York Gov Andrew Cuomo for challenging legislators to broaden and strengthen rights of women, including abortion rights; contends bill proposed by Cuomo that would provide assurance that abortions would remain safe and legal in New York deserves support of every New York lawmaker who is ready to do more than talk about equal rights and protections for women.
lead_paragraph: Senate leaders, however, are blocking an abortion rights provision from coming to a vote.
